item.title: [NCE3] Lesson 1 A puma at large
item.author: 作者
item.description: 词汇 spot n. 斑点 a big red spot 一个大红斑 a spot on one’s reputation 某人名誉上有污点 A leopard won’t change its spots 江山易改，秉性难移 spot of sth 一点… a spot of bother 一点小麻烦 You seem to be having
